DOC.brief_summary: Resistance training widely use training rehabilitation . During recent year elastic resistance training become increasingly popular prevent relieve neck/shoulder/arm pain among sedentary employee . While research study document positive effect intervention use training instructor , train practice use instructor rather depend information source internet . Here investigator examine - outcome assessor blind randomize control trial - effect 2 week elastic resistance training neck/shoulder/arm personal versus video instruction technical execution .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Personal Versus Video Instruction Elastic Resistance Exercise Technical Execution ( IRMA05 )
DOC.criteria: neck shoulder pain blood pressure 160/100 mmHg pregnancy lifethreatening disease
